column2: Even though we lost, the TEAM looked much better tonight. Thanks to all the memphians that came out and supported us at the Forum!
We broke the ice today with the first win! Great game by both rookies, @TheRightPargo1 and @joshselby2 keep it up! #theygotswagger
De camino a Utah, espero que los Reyes Magos os traigan muchos regalos! Me parece que algun@ lo tocara carbon del bueno!! #hassidobueno?
In my country tonight its an special night bc of the #threewisemen do u guys celebrate this here also? It was the best night of the year!!
De cami a Utah, espero que els Reis Mags os portin molts regals! Encara que algun li tocara carbo del bo! #thasportatbe?
It wasnt pretty, but we won! Great team win on the road! Now having dinner with Darko, @mconley11 and @rickyrubio9 !!! #goodtimes
Tough loss... There is no doubt in my mind that we will get better. On our way to Los Angeles right now. #oneteamonegoal

"the true measure of a man is not shown in times of prosperity but in times of adversity"
#MLKJr
Después de una lluviosa mañana  y mucho viento, ya estamos en el avión hacia New Orleans! Que ganas de que llegue mañana! #elclasico
Despres d'un mati amb molt de vent i pluja, ja estem a l'avio de cami a New Orleans! Quines ganes que arribi dema!! #elclassic
Great day! We win on the road against the Hornets and Barcelona beats Madrid at their place too! #keepgettingbetter
Cruzando el puente de la bahía de San Francisco escuchando a Otis Redding!  "sitting in the dock of the bay" #relax
Molts anims per Manel Comas, una forta abraçada desde Estats Units!
On our way to San Francisco. We had a great win last night. We want more, never satisfied! #TimeToGrind
Bueno, como dice la canción, "cada dia sale el sol chipiron". Fue un partido duro, pero ya estamos de camino hacia Los Angeles!
Tough game in Rip City, give them credit!! Now it's time to get our rest, regroup and prepare the game against the @LAClippers #gritandgrind
Aquest cop viure #elclassic a 10.000 metres. L'escoltare per la radio. Hem sembla increible que a l'avio hi hagi wifi!
Esta vez viviré #elclasico a 10.000 metros de altura, lo escuchare por la radio! Me parece increible que tengamos wifi en el avión!!
Acabo d'arribar a l'avio, alguns dels meus companys han anat a la fabrica de Nike, i mhan portat uns "regalets" #FCB  http://t.co/xWYFufCx
Got to keep grinding... We will keep fighting... never give up! That's what we are about! Now on our way to Phoenix #BelieveMEMPHIS
Just landed in Boston, after a tough game in OKC... Let's get some rest, and tomorrow we will prepare the game on sunday #GrizzNation
Much needed win, my teammates @Mospeights16 @DlamarC33 @QuincyPondexter and @TheRightPargo1 played great! Way to hoop fellas!!
Great win! Yes sir! Having dinner now with @darthur00 and @mconley11 , the forum looked awesome tonight! #GrizzNation
Que peluca me lleva el gran Juan Carlos Navarro!!! Grande!! #CopaACB
I'm happier than the PIG in that commercial!! Weee, weee, weeeeeeee!!!!!!!! Way to go TEAM! #GrizzNation
Felt great to be back at the Forum! Good team win! Together, there is nothing we can't achieve! #GrizzNation
Does anybody have Costa's cell number from ProjectX? I'm trying to throw a little get together soon...
What an amazing time with the @StJude  family! Had a "little" tea party with some friends at the Grizzlies' House! http://t.co/yCDWTQEn
Good win tonight, thank you memphians for giving us that extra push! Gonna miss yall on the road next week!! #grizznation
Another tough one... Let's get back in to playing hard nosed defense, and be who we are! The Memphis Grizzlies! #GrizzNation
Avui partit contra @warriors , pero abans, a disfrutar del Barça contra el Milan! #BarçaMilan #espectacle #sempreunits
Dia de descanso en Miami... a recuperar fuerzas que viene un final apretado. Hoy toca Nobu si o si!
Day off in Miami today... Getting ready for the final sprint of the season! Dinner at Nobu it's a no brainer tonight!
Important win tonight, thanks to our fans for coming out and giving us that much needed extra push at the end... #GrizzNation

Tot be, tornare tan aviat sigui possible!
Todo bien, volveré tan rápido como pueda!
Its all good! Ill be back as soon as possible!
Haven't done anything yet but it feels good to go home for game 7! After the game with @MacBo50 leavin #believememphis http://t.co/jS3L7BEM

Ready to take off!
Preparats per sortir!
Preparados para salir!
#firstgame #GrizzNation http://t.co/xmJb8107
It's inevitable to start singing Scott McKenzie's song on a trip to San Francisco... http://t.co/8dSY1xUR
Just finished practice at USC, very nice facilities. Now heading to San Francisco. #believememphis #OneTeamOneGoal http://t.co/YZ2EveLM
Es imposible no empezar a cantar la canción de Scott McKenzie en un viaje a San Francisco... http://t.co/P0pZe87r
Whatever we do, we do it as a team. We win together, we lose together! #OneTeamOneGoal #OnToTheNextOne
Es impossible no començar a cantar la cançó de Scott McKenzie en un viatje a San Francisco... http://t.co/r5ykJaOB
Welcome to Robert Pera to our family and the city of Memphis. Blue collar team in a blue collar city! #OneTeamOneGoal
Today's game was won by the second unit and the crowd! When the forum looks and sounds like that we are a different team! #OneTeamOneGoal
Another good road win, when we play together on both ends we are a much more unpredictable team. Great job again by our second unit! #BIG
One of those nights for me where the ball just couldn't go through the basket. Most important, we WON! #GoGrizz http://t.co/q8ONnUyO
Another good road win, great basketball atmosphere at the @okcthunder arena. Happy to see my man @sergeibaka9 again! #OneTeamOneGoal
It wasn't our best game, but we got the W! Gotta keep getting better every chance we get. Well deserved day off tomorrow #wedontbluffcity

Per fi a casa, bona nit a tothom o bon dia!
Por fin en casa, buenas noches o buenos días a tod@s! 
#micamaesmia http://t.co/wzNo2Sln
Done with practice! @MacBo50 the @memgrizz and myself wanna wish u and ur family a happy Thanksgiving day! http://t.co/z05OZfe1
Great time at BBKing's downtown tonight after the game. I love the combination of sublime live music and good food #blues&jazzallday
Sentado en el avión listo para salir hacia Phoenix. Gira de tres partidos, uno a uno pero los necesitamos todos! http://t.co/AGrjWdEY
Sentat al avió preparat per sortir cap a Phoenix. Tenim una gira de tres partits, un a un pero els necessitem tots! http://t.co/vBdJcLik
Sitting on the plane waiting to take off. Destination Phoenix! 3 game road trip, must take one game at a time but need them all... #GNG
Important road win, it feels good to get back on the right path. The key was DEFENSE in the second half. #OneTeamOneGoal #GoGrizz
#AnimsTito
Bon Nadal!El Pare Noel ja ha arribat a Memphis!Que tal us ha anat?Alan i jo us desitgem que acabeu de passar-ho genial! http://t.co/Ipeywnq9
Feliz Navidad!Papa Noel ha pasado por Memphis!Q tal os fue a vosotros?Alan y yo deseamos q acabéis de pasarlo genial! http://t.co/TtO4tBWB
Merry Christmas!Santa Claus has come to Memphis! How did he treat u guys? Alan and I hope that u having fun! http://t.co/boo78kfc
Cuado la bomba navarro esta en modo #ON no hay nada que hacer... Bueno si, sentarse  y sonreír...
Much needed win. #believe #GNG

My challenge for 2013 is to work even harder and lead the Grizzlies to
a historic season. What's yours? #makeitcount #teamnike

Mi reto para 2013 es trabajar aún más duro para llevar a los Grizzlies a
una temporada histórica. ¿Cuál es el tuyo? #makeitcount #teamnike

Preparat per la nit de Reis!
Preparado para los Reyes Magos!
Ready for the Three Wise man!
#tradition #carbon #caganer http://t.co/WQEiBKRU
Great road trip, 3-0! When we play together we are a completely different team! Now time to get home and play another really good team! #GNG
Deshielo del avión antes de despegar rumbo a San Antonio. http://t.co/j1cYqxAR
Desglaçant l'avió abans de l'enlairement direcció Sant Antonio. http://t.co/Rq6lv4E2
Deicing the plane before take off destination San Antonio. http://t.co/06ewdC9G
We played like a TEAM, and the fans were great! What a great combination. Let's build on it and take steps forward. #OnToTheNextOne #GNG
Entrenament acabat, ara aviam si trobo on veure #elclassic
End of training, now let's see where can I watch the #clasico
Entreno acabado, ahora a ver si encuentro donde ver #elclasico
“@mconley11: Turn on the lights !” 🎵🔊🔊I'm looking for her...🔊🔊🎵
Començant a veure la pel·lícula "Volare" amb en Joel Joan. Sobretaula perfecta pel meu horari! #cafeto
Ahora a entrenar y luego a ver la Copa! Vaya dos semis nos esperan! Bueno, mucha suerte a todos. #CopaACB
Very happy about the win. Now, lets keep it up! The tougher it gets the better it tastes... #OneTeamOneGoal #GritNGrind
As the great satchmo would say "it dont mean a thing if it ain't got that swing". It's a great way to finish of a Sunday #musicmodeon
Wasn't a beautiful game but we'll take it. Great to see my buddy @rickyrubio9 . Thanks to everyone that came out and supported us tonight
Ready to watch @MacBo50 put in some work at #AllStar game in Houston! Representing the idon't-Bluff city!
Couldn't make a shot tonight...One of those nights, BUT we won! It was an emotional game, we played with a lot of heart! #OneTeamOneGoal
“@lausanneschool: Lynx tied 17-17 after the first quarter!” Let's go!
Great to be at the forum again, thanks to everyone that supported us tonight! We got another W under the belt, taking steps forward. #GNG
Que grans... Sense paraules... #gracies #barça
Game time! #GNG #GoGrizz http://t.co/wQDbgWoj28
What an atmosphere tonight! Huge team effort, everybody played a big part! Enjoy tonight, tomorrow lets get back to work! #UnitedWeGrind
Como dirian los amigos de @lapegatina esto "NON E FAAAACILE". A entrenar para mejorar! Parece sencillo, no? Vamos allá!! #sicollons

Gran noticia la convocatoria de Abidal #superación http://t.co/aly0LG3INq
Great road win, our bench took care of business! Always good to see @rickyrubio9 . #OneTeamOneGoal #GNG
Big plays down the stretch by @mconley11 !! Gotta give them credit, very disciplined and organized team! #50wins #itsnotthateasy #GNG
“@aa000G9: Starving Like Marvin! Need Food Fast!!” 🎵🎵U don't even know it... 🎵🎵
Gran homenatge als campions de la final 4 a Barcelona 03! Vaig tindré la sort d'apendre moltíssim d'aquests jugadors i entrenadors al 2004.
Ready to get home, it has been a good road trip. For us to win, we can only do it as a TEAM, ain't no way around it #futurevoice #GNG
Just like AC/DC would say "its a long way to the top if u wanna Rock 'n' Roll"
Keep calm and play Basketball
Very proud of my teammates. The forum looked amazing... Lets enjoy tonight and tomorrow we will get back to work. #grizznation #nevereasy

Les sabatilles fan 35cm i son per/Las zapas miden 35cm y se las lleva/The sneakers measured 35cm & goes to @jcarlos_martin & @kendallphilips
Thank you all for your answers, it was fun to see so many different measures. Notice that more surprises are to come ...!

Vamos a mandar a los ganadores a LA, desde cualquier lugar del mundo! Gracias al concurso de @mobli y @gasolfoundation !
